Headline: Loop- Bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop- Bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Pulaski. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop- Bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Pulaski.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
